title: She Got Me: Kayla
description: A little episode in the bathroom and Kayla can't keep her mind off Tyrone.The scene kept playing over and over, the way Tyrone's hands felt, her heart thundering, and the ache she felt when his lips finally left hers. How could she not think about him?There's one problem: Kayla is already seeing someone. As her feelings for Tyrone deepen, her relationship with DeAndre becomes strained. Now, she must decide which man is worth her love.Will Kayla play the field or will she take a chance and ride off the sunset with Mr. Tyrone Sloane?
author: Just Bae
